ComicInfo.Title: Where Are We?; Tears From Heaven: The Life and Times of Errata Stigmata; Mechanics / Las Mujeres Perdidas Part Six
ComicInfo.Summary:
Where Are We?: Rocky and Fumble have a short-lived adventure paddling in a small boat in the ocean.
Tears From Heaven: The Life and Times of Errata Stigmata: Errata's harsh backstory from baby to young stigmatic child.
Mechanics / Las Mujeres Perdidas Part Six: Rena and Maggie are in a small Chepan village waiting for the authorities to find them. Because the world thinks she's dead, Rena decides to leave by herself to enjoy the freedom offered by that. Maggie stays and turns herself in, leaving the island but not before sending a goodbye/resignation note to Rand.
